title: Introduction to Hypnotherapy for Women's Wellness
body: In this introduction to the Hypnotherapy for Women’s Wellness audio meditations, instructor Sophie Fox shares some insights to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.
teaser: In this introduction to the Hypnotherapy for Women’s Wellness audio meditations, instructor Sophie Fox shares some insights to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.

title: Premenstrual Syndrome
body:
This Premenstrual Syndrome meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who suffer from Premenstrual Syndrome (PMS) and need help managing and controlling it. 

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.  Around 90% of menstruating women get advance warning of an approaching period because of physical and/or psychological changes in the days before their period starts. For most women the symptoms are mild, but many find their symptoms so severe that they dread this time of the month. About a third of women say PMS significantly affects their life and that they feel like a different person at this time of the month. So in this session we will help you remain in control of your hormonal fluctuations and to stop dreading your monthly cycle as you take back control and embrace this time with confidence and calm. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to managing premenstrual syndrome symptoms.
teaser: This Premenstrual Syndrome meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who suffer from Premenstrual Syndrome (PMS) and need help managing and controlling it.

title: Period Discomfort
body:
This Period Discomfort guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for those who need help managing pain when menstruating. 

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. Menstrual pains are when you are feeling your uterus (womb) contract to shed its lining. Pretty amazing, but for some it can be very painful and not feel so great.  In our session we will teach you some techniques to help loosen up your muscles to help aid period pain relief. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to managing period discomfort.
teaser: This Period Discomfort guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for those who need help managing pain when menstruating.

title: Managing Pain
body:
This Managing Pain guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who suffer from feeling pain and need to find ways to help manage it.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.  All pain, no matter how the pain originates, consists of some muscle tension.  Our session will teach you some techniques to help manage and control your pain, relax and let go of tension, so you find yourself feeling much more comfortable, much more at ease and more in control.  We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to managing your pain.
teaser: This Managing Pain guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who suffer from feeling pain and need to find ways to help manage it.

title: Getting Pregnant
body:
This Getting Pregnant guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is designed to help women in the journey to pregnancy.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. In the past, you may have felt anxious or perhaps even desperate to conceive and enjoy a healthy pregnancy.  In this session we will help you relax and let go by visualizing that your baby has been conceived in your mind and believing that this process will happen and allowing your conscious, thinking mind to forget whatever it is that you need to forget to prepare your body to receive what you need to in order to achieve a successful conception.  We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to helping you become pregnant.
teaser: This Getting Pregnant guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is designed to help women in the journey to pregnancy.

title: Hypnobirthing
body:
This Hypnobirthing Guided Meditation & Hypnotherapy session is for women wanting to learn relaxation, visualisation and self-hypnosis skills to help them have a calm and positive birth experience.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. Childbirth can be a frightening experience building up fear and tension.  But without fear and stress, your body can produce more endorphins – a natural relaxant and pain killer – and replace the stress hormones that can cause your muscles to tense up and tighten, which can be the main source of pain during childbirth. In this session we will teach you various tools, like self-hypnosis, controlled breathing techniques, and relaxation exercises to help change your birth experience so it's a peaceful and calm one.  We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to having a positive birth experience.
teaser: This Hypnobirthing Guided Meditation & Hypnotherapy session is for women wanting to learn relaxation, visualisation and self-hypnosis skills to help them have a calm and positive birth experience.

title: Menopause
body:
This Menopause guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who are going through menopause.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. 

Menopause can cause a huge number of symptoms and bodily changes, both physical and emotional. While physical symptoms like the night sweats and irregular periods are the more visible and talked about, the emotional symptoms such as anxiety deserve just as much recognition.This session will help you to adjust to this time of life and to learn how to manage and control your symptoms. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to managing menopause.
teaser: This Menopause guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who are going through menopause.
